data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The baseline for this functionality is embedded in the report
    generation features of Devel::Cover. It has the potential to be
    useful outside of this specific application, however, so I've broken
    it out into it's own module. The target application is still code
    coverage (not digital design), so the Devel::* namespace seems the
    right place for it.
